Method Detail

getPowerPlants

public static java.util.List<PowerPlant> getPowerPlants(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
Reads in a jsonArray of power plants and returns a List of PowerPlant objects. If any of the items in the jsonArray lacks the required attributes, then no PowerPlant is made for that particular item. Excess attributes are ignored.

Parameters:
jsonArray - An input array that may or may not contain some power plant items.
Returns:
A list of all the PowerPlant objects that could be made with the input data.

getPowerPlantsMappedByName

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,PowerPlant> getPowerPlantsMappedByName(com.google.gson.JsonArray jsonArray)
Convenience method to get the list of power plants parameterized by name.

Parameters:
jsonArray - A JsonArray that contains our power plant data.
Returns:
A map of power plants, keyed by their names.

getSinglePowerPlant

public static PowerPlant getSinglePowerPlant(com.google.gson.JsonElement element)
Creates a single PowerPlant object out of a JsonElement.

Parameters:
element - The JsonElement that (in theory) contains the data for the PowerPlant definition.
Returns:
A PowerPlant, or null if no object could be made from the given
